Posted By: ironman2293 (6/16/2011 8:11:54 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I think he's been outclassed by [Balefire Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Balefire Dragon). Sure it is one more mana, but it is:  
- Two less colors.  
- Doesn't hit your creatures, at all.  
- Hits your opponent's creatures twice as hard.  
- Doesn't need mana for it's ability.  
  
Oh and DarthParallax, that was awesome. :-P

posts.post_content:
Numot: Legendary Dragons, Assemble!  
Oros: Numot, you're not Captain America. But I am an Avenger. I should be the leader.  
Teneb: What? Why are we Assemling?   
Intet: Did they actually make that Goblin-Rigger thingy a contraption to Assemble?  
 I've been tinkering around with the idea, but never could get the   
 basic artifact Mana to work nicely. And then JARVIS said to wake up.  
Vorosh: We appear to be stuck in a fanfiction, Teneb. Best just hope the author runs out of bad ideas  
 before something real awful happens. oops. oh no, I jinxed it.  
  
Rith: HULK SMASH!!!  
  
Nicol Bolas: If I'm the bad guy AGAIN, this author has no imagination.
